means: 工作清闲但报酬优厚的职位，挂名的好差事

sentence.Network_en: She found him an exalted sinecure as a Fellow of the Library of Congress.
sentence.Network_cn: 她给他找了一个级别很高的闲职：国会图书馆研究员。

sentence.Network_en: He even had a job, a sinecure, more highly - paid than his old job had been.
sentence.Network_cn: 他甚至还有一个工作, 一个挂名差使,比他原来的工作的待遇要好多了.

sentence.Network_en: His stable services were merely a sinecure, and consisted simply in a daily care and inspection.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在马厩里的工作是个轻闲差使, 每天只要去照料照料巡视一番.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... simulation 模仿品>真品 sinecure 闲职>艰苦的工作 skirt 回避>面对(动词反面关系).
再要你命3000 List23 flashcards | Quizlet ... sincere 真诚的, 不做作的: sinecure 美差: sinew 活力, 力量.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... outre 奇怪的，荒诞的 sinecure 挂名差事，闲职 epicure 美食家.
散字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 散文诗〖 prosepoem〗 散职〖 sinecure〗 散装〖 bulk〗.

RelatedPhrase.word: Hold a sinecure job and eat white rice

list.key: Hold a sinecure job and eat white rice
list.abs: Hold a sinecure job and eat white rice ., 尸位素餐.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin sine cura 'without care'

entry.tran: (拿薪水却很少工作或担负责任的)闲职，挂名职位
entry.def: A sinecure is a job for which you receive payment but which does not involve much work or responsibility.

example.ex: She found him an exalted sinecure as a Fellow of the Library of Congress.
example.tran: 她给他找了一个级别很高的闲职：国会图书馆研究员。

example.ex: ...a lucrative sinecure with a big law firm.
example.tran: 在一家大型法律事务所从事的悠闲自得的肥差

means.word_mean: 1. a benefice to which no spiritual or pastoral duties are attached
2. an office that involves minimal duties

auth_sentence.content: Never man...So moulder'd in a sinecure as he.
auth_sentence.res_content: Never man...So moulder'd in a sinecure as he.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Never man...So moulder'd in a sinecure as he.

auth_sentence.content: Found a sinecure as companion to the son of a wealthy family.
auth_sentence.res_content: Found a sinecure as companion to the son of a wealthy family.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Found a sinecure as companion to the son of a wealthy family.

auth_sentence.content: This is in addition to his well compensated feeding at the public trough with his Gorean sinecure.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is in addition to his well compensated feeding at the public trough with his Gorean sinecure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is in addition to his well compensated feeding at the public trough with his Gorean sinecure.
